title: Eureka stockade
creator_credit: Harry Watt, Leslie Norman, Sir Michael Balcon and Ealing Studios
brief_description: In 1854, the government instigated moves designed to drive the gold miners from Eureka Hill goldfields. The miners showed their opposition to the move by revolting. The legendary leader Peter Lalor is portrayed by Chips Rafferty. Cast includes: Peter Finch, Jane Barrett, Jack Lambert, Gordon Jackson.
